page.title: 14EVERYDAY LIFE 1(Countryside)
page.content: {By THERESA GUTHRIE I live in the countryside. It is different from the town as it is less noisy because there is less traffic. There are four farms where I live so there is often a strong smell of manure. Also there is a lot of other pollution from chemicals in the fields. It is sometimes boring as there are not many people around so I often go for a bike ride in the countryside and see rabbits in the fields. I also see a lot of squashed animals in the road which I find disturbing. I go horse riding with my friend who has two ponies. We have quite a big garden so we grow our own vegetables. There is also a fruit and vegetable farm. I watch the television most of the time because there isn't much else to do.
